name: Qwerty Quest
description:
An urgent matter demands your immediate attention! I, King Qwerty, ruler of the Kingdom of Knowledge, summon your aid in a crucial mission—to eliminate the treacherous Dreamscribe, the very source of the dragon-induced nightmares that threaten the magical gems guarding us against the insidious Curse of Silence.

Together, let us unite against the Dreamscribe and safeguard our realm from the curse's grip. As brave Wordslayers, your role in completing this epic typing competition adventure is paramount. The future of our kingdom hangs in the balance, and your typing skills are our greatest asset.

Answer my call, brave warriors, and join me in this battle against the Dreamscribe. Let us vanquish nightmares and protect the magical gems, preserving our world from the clutches of the Curse of Silence.

With unwavering determination,

-King Qwerty, Leader of the Kingdom of Knowledge

CHOOSE YOUR WORDSLAYER
Wordslayers are magical creatures that fight with words as their weapons:
LEO THE LEGENDARY roars into battle with superior health
ARI THE ACCURATE delivers deadly critical strikes
REX THE RAGER is hungry for a delicious lifetap
BOB THE BERSERKER becomes enraged when near death
IVY THE INSANE blasts enemies with a stunning scream
SID THE SNIPER stings the nostrils with stinky cheese
LIZ THE LIMITLESS grows a new tail with regeneration
OZI THE OUTCAST dives in with a cyclone spin

CHOOSE YOUR DIFFICULTY
Each difficulty adds one more letter to the words and makes the enemy type faster:
A: 1-letter every 10 seconds
OK: 2-letter words every 7 seconds
SIR: 3-letter words every 4 seconds
LORD: 4-letter words every 2 seconds
GUARD: 5-letter words every 1 second
KNIGHT: 6-letter words every 0.5 seconds
PALADIN: 7-letter words every 0.25 seconds
MYRMIDON: 8-letter words every 0.15 seconds

CHOOSE YOUR QWERTY QUEST
Complete a series of quests to gather the magical artifacts and lift the Curse of Silence:
WILDS: Hunt Gobbletooth to recover the stolen Emerald!
TUNDRA: Search for Cobalt to recover the stolen Sapphire!
ABYSS: Track Stonehead to recover the stolen Ruby!
CRYPT: Chase Windbreaker to recover the stolen Diamond!
DREAM: Challenge the Dreamscribe to recover the stolen Moonstone!

WILD WORDS
Special surprise words that give you temporary abilities during battle:
FIRE: Summons a blazing meteor from the sky!
COLD: Causes an icy comet to explode on impact!
GERM: Releases a poisonous gas cloud!
BOLT: Unleashes a powerful lightning bolt!
GOLD: Steals some random gold!
HEAL: Instantly restores your health!
TIME: Slows down time by half!

RIP THE REAPER
Need another opportunity to save the day?
When you run out of lives, RIP the Reaper comes to help in exchange for a little Gold!

HIGH SCORE LEADERBOARDS
Score = Word Length x Score Multiplier
The score multiplier becomes active after you get four correct words in a row.
There is no limit to how high the score multiplier can go!

STORE
Earn Gold to get more awesome Wordslayers to join you on your quest!
